"Nameless City Residential Area Exploration is a Quest in which you freely explore and investigate the residential district of the Nameless City, leaving when the time limit is reached.

If you can collect enough Exploration Points over the course of your investigation, you will be able to unlock special chests and obtain a variety of rewards.
